gel.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a thick wet substance that is used in beauty or cleaning products
gel.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: if a thought, plan etc gels, it becomes clearer or more definite
gel.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: Don’t start writing until the idea has gelled in your mind.
gel.translation[1].definitions[1].defini: if two or more people gel, they start working well together as a group
gel.translation[1].definitions[1].exampl: After two days, the group gelled into a team.
He did not gel with Chapman.
gel.translation[1].definitions[2].defini: if a liquid gels, it becomes firmer or thicker
gel.translation[1].definitions[3].defini: to put gel into your hair
gel.translation[2].definitions[0].defini: used to represent the word ‘girl’, when it is said in this way
